statements: SELECT * FROM SoilAnalysisData;
SELECT sample_id, soil_type FROM SoilAnalysisData;
SELECT depth, moisture_content FROM SoilAnalysisData WHERE moisture_content > 20;
SELECT * FROM SoilAnalysisData ORDER BY depth DESC;
SELECT sample_id, soil_type FROM SoilAnalysisData WHERE depth < 10 ORDER BY sample_id;
SELECT sample_id, depth, soil_type, moisture_content FROM SoilAnalysisData WHERE depth > 10 ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT sample_id, soil_type FROM SoilAnalysisData WHERE moisture_content < 20 ORDER BY sample_id ASC, moisture_content DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilAnalysisData WHERE soil_type = 'Clay' AND moisture_content BETWEEN 15 AND 30;
SELECT sample_id, depth, moisture_content FROM SoilAnalysisData WHERE moisture_content > 25 ORDER BY depth ASC;
SELECT sample_id, soil_type FROM SoilAnalysisData WHERE depth < 5 OR moisture_content > 20 ORDER BY sample_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples
SELECT sample_id, sample_location FROM soil_samples WHERE sample_depth > 10
SELECT sample_location, sample_date FROM soil_samples ORDER BY sample_date DESC
SELECT analysis_id, lab_technician, analysis_date, analysis_results FROM lab_analysis WHERE analysis_date > '2020-01-01'
SELECT * FROM lab_analysis ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
SELECT * FROM soil_samples WHERE sample_location='Garden' AND sample_depth > 10 ORDER BY sample_date DESC;
SELECT analysis_id, lab_technician FROM lab_analysis WHERE analysis_results LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY analysis_date ASC;
SELECT sample_id, sample_location, sample_depth FROM soil_samples WHERE sample_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY sample_id;
SELECT s.sample_id, s.sample_location, a.analysis_results FROM soil_samples s JOIN lab_analysis a ON s.sample_id = a.sample_id WHERE a.lab_technician='John Doe';
SELECT s.sample_location, s.sample_depth, a.analysis_results FROM soil_samples s LEFT JOIN lab_analysis a ON s.sample_id = a.sample_id AND a.analysis_date='2022-02-15';
SELECT * FROM geotechnical_data ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT sample_location, sample_depth FROM geotechnical_data WHERE sample_depth < 10 ORDER BY sample_depth ASC;
SELECT analysis_id, sample_id, moisture_content FROM soil_analysis WHERE moisture_content > 20;
SELECT sample_location, sample_description FROM geotechnical_data WHERE sample_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT sample_id, depth_from, depth_to, dry_density FROM soil_analysis WHERE dry_density BETWEEN 1.5 AND 2.5;
SELECT * FROM geotechnical_data WHERE sample_depth > 10
SELECT sample_location, sample_description FROM geotechnical_data WHERE sample_location = 'Site A'
SELECT analysis_id, moisture_content, dry_density FROM soil_analysis WHERE dry_density > 1.5
SELECT * FROM soil_properties WHERE property_type = 'Permeability' AND property_value > 0.5
SELECT sample_location, sample_depth, moisture_content FROM geotechnical_data JOIN soil_analysis ON geotechnical_data.sample_id = soil_analysis.sample_id
SELECT * FROM soil_samples;
SELECT sample_location, sample_depth FROM soil_samples WHERE sample_type = 'Clay';
SELECT sample_id, sample_location FROM soil_samples ORDER BY sample_id DESC;
SELECT s.sample_location, t.test_type, r.test_value FROM soil_samples s JOIN test_results r ON s.sample_id = r.sample_id JOIN soil_types t ON s.sample_type = t.soil_name;
SELECT DISTINCT sample_type FROM soil_samples ORDER BY sample_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples JOIN test_results ON soil_samples.sample_id = test_results.sample_id WHERE sample_type = 'Clay' AND test_value > 10 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT sample_location, sample_depth FROM soil_samples WHERE sample_type = 'Sandy' AND sample_depth < 5;
SELECT soil_name, description FROM soil_types WHERE type_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY soil_name ASC;
SELECT method_name, equipment_required FROM test_methods WHERE method_name LIKE '%chemical%' OR method_name LIKE '%physical%' ORDER BY method_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM soil_samples WHERE sample_depth BETWEEN 2.0 AND 3.0 AND sample_location LIKE 'Area%' ORDER BY sample_location ASC,sample_depth DESC;
SELECT * FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT sample_id, soil_type, depth, moisture_content FROM SoilSamples;
SELECT engineer_id, name, specialty FROM Engineers ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT location_id, latitude, longitude FROM SampleLocations WHERE latitude > 40;
SELECT result_id, sample_id, test_date, test_type, result_value FROM TestResults ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Engineers WHERE specialty = 'Geotechnical';
SELECT sample_id, soil_type, moisture_content FROM SoilSamples WHERE depth < 10 ORDER BY moisture_content DESC;
SELECT TestResults.result_id, TestResults.result_value, Engineers.name FROM TestResults JOIN Engineers ON TestResults.result_id = Engineers.engineer_id WHERE Engineers.specialty = 'Materials';
SELECT name, description FROM TestMethods WHERE method_id IN (SELECT DISTINCT method_id FROM TestResults);
SELECT sample_id, latitude, longitude FROM SampleLocations WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -120 AND -100;
